description.component: Breadcrumb trail items that indicate the current page’s location within a navigational hierarchy that automatically adds separators via CSS.

divider.name: Divider
divider.description: Dividers are automatically added in CSS through ::before and content. They can be changed by modifying a local CSS custom property --bs-breadcrumb-divider, or through the $breadcrumb-divider Sass variable — and $breadcrumb-divider-flipped for its RTL counterpart, if needed.
